Release.Notes:
New formats: - MIF archives, BCF and NG3 images - 'mrg0' archives - 'SHA_' archives - 'GML_ARC' archives - TIL images - RAD archives and RSG images - PAQ archives DZP images - PKZ archives, JBP images and KOG audio - updated KiriKiri and ShiinaRio encryption schemes
Improved handling of composite TLG images.
